mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.name as extra_writerName FROM article A JOIN `member` M ON A.writerId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id}
